description: Ask 'why' five times to find root cause
use_case: Problem definition and root cause analysis

description: Imagine the project failed and work backward
Identify all system checks and balances
Map how data moves through system
Invert the problem to find good ideas
List all ways system could break (FMEA)
Invert the problem: How to ensure failure?
use_case: Identifying hidden risks and non-obvious fixes

description: Start from success and map backward
Deep-dive into a specific future failure
Focus on the 20% features for 80% ROI
Assign two agents to debate conflicting views

use_case: UI layout and landing page optimization
